text: "Gloria" is a 1981 song by Irish rock band U2 and is the opening track and the second single from their second studio album October. It went to number 55 in the United Kingdom but was more successful in Ireland where it peaked at #10 and New Zealand where it peaked at #15. ==Track listing== == References == Category:1981 songs Category:U2 songs
title: Gloria (U2 song)
